Hey all, I'm looking for a way to allow end users the ability to set the market (e.g. UK, US, Germany, etc) of the content they are creating through a single choice field. Is there a way to allow that choice field to also effect content within a local module?

I could create multiple modules, 1 for each market and use if statements, but that's a lot of maintenance down the line. I'm looking for a way to have it all contained in 1 module.
I may be missing the point, but why not use HubSpotâ€™s multi language support?

Sorry, probably a bad example to use language! :sweat_smile:. Lets change it to market instead. UK, US, Germany, France, Etc.

Basically the use cases sits outside the functionality of multi-language content.
or is it just for one module

Should probably also say this is for email templates!

Don't worry about the fact if statements are not supported + other hubl support won't work with email templates. Just trying to work out how to get this choice module value visible to the local module :slightly_smiling_face:
